Tom Watson, the former defence minister who used his seat on the culture select committee to chase down Andy Coulson , said his departure creates serious questions over the prime minister's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. Rupert Murdoch is waiting to hear if his bid will be referred to the Competition Commission.

the unusual things teams are coming up with to defend Michael Vick . "I think we're making good adjustments as players and coaches; I like to do that sooner than later," Reid said. We're getting some unique looks. Everybody has a certain way,[ defensively] that they're playing Michael Vick , and it's not your normal- it's hard to put on another tape and see teams do what they do to Michael Vick , they just change things up and throw you a little bit of a curveball. So you have to make some adjustments. You have to be able to do that. Sunday, the biggest adjustment seemed to be the offensive line finally sorting out the Giants' blitzes, giving Michael Vick a little time and room to work with, especially when he decided to run.

You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."
